data.name: Love Colors - Everyday Pixels
data.detailed_description:
Enjoy and paint more stunning pixel art: mandalas, vehicles, famous paintings, people of various professions and others!

100+ new pictures to color on your own or with family and friends!
Love Colors - Everyday Pixels contains:
• 10 various vehicles: passenger cars, bus, bike, constructor truck and even country wagon!
• 11 symmetrical and vibrant Mandalas
• 10 pixelated masterpieces of Rembrandt, da Vinci, van Gogh and other artists
• 10 steampunk themes (cat included)
• 10 musical essentials: instruments, singers and equipment
• 10 train related items: rails, wagons, languages and stations
• 12 interiors and household equipment
• 10 Science Fiction themes
• 12 people representing different professions
• 10 pictures which come to your mind when you think about science

data.short_description: Enjoy and paint more stunning pixel art: mandalas, vehicles, famous paintings, people of various professions and others!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible graphics
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
